welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Kerma, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in its beauty and culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Es Senia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Es Senia Airport is responsible for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tafaraoui Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tafaraoui Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sidi Belabbes Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sidi Belabbes Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
